website_summaries.verdict: With a generous number of pieces in a variety of classic colors, this jumbo set inspires unbridled creativity and will accommodate group play.
pros: Large number of pieces allows kids to construct elaborate designs or multiple smaller creations
Ideal for playing with siblings and friends, or family fun
Both younger and older kids can have a blast with endless 2D and 3D configuration options
cons: May pose a choking hazard for children under 3

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: These are great because not everyone has them. Therefore when someone sees them they want to play. I recently brought them on a trip to see family and just dumped them on the table and no one could resist. My 4 year old son all the way to my 93 year old grandma were all building things. It was fun to see. Sorry the pictures are terrible but my 4 year old took them. Some things that were made were spongebob with Gary, Mario with a ? Block, A unicorn with a rainbow, and then some people and cubes. I want another set but it will be a while to save up.
customer_reviews.author: @Landryslunches

customer_reviews.title: Christmas win.
customer_reviews.text: These little connector pieces are a ton of fun! Got these for my kids (3 and 4.5) the pieces are very small so be careful if you have a child that still puts toys in their mouths (maybe consider the larger version). My kids are having so much fun building and just connecting these together. Great for working on fine motor skills. I also love that I can take a handful in my purse and have a fun activity for my kids when we are out (car, waiting room, restaurant, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 12 and loves these more than legos...wants to be an engineer now!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 12, has mild TS/anxieties, wants to be an engineer, and these things occupy a lot of her time. She loves organizing them into a clear tackle/craft box...and reorganizing over and over...building things with awesome patterns. We bought a few more boxes because it's better than having her watch tube videos to relax, and she really exersizes her brain with extending the limits of this singular-shape construction.
customer_reviews.author: sherri cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: These are the mini ones. They are a lot smaller than I thought they would be. There is a pamphlet inside the box but it doesn't give very good directions, and it only has how tos for a couple things. The website has directions for a few animals but that's it. My four year old can out them together but he can't make a car on his own like the box has a picture of, I think these would be better for a child who is a bit older as he gets frustrated that he can't make what he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Linsi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toys for Fidgeters!
customer_reviews.text: I run a camp and after school program and these are perfect, absolutely perfect for fidgeters both kids and adults. Just a vial of the smaller Plus Plus blocks was enough per person, but they were so popular that I had to buy a bigger box and I have not regretted it at all. A great appeal is that they can create 2D and 3D constructions with ease, unlike LEGO's and that's perfect for all of my fidgeters who love turning things this way and that way in their hands. They're lifesavers on so many levels and I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Sami Sion Haggood

customer_reviews.title: Plus Plus Unlimited
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves creating with Plus Plus blocks. He was beyond thrilled to receive the "PLUS PLUS - Construction Building Toy, Open Play Set - 1200 Piece - Basic Color Mix". It gives him the resources to continue to allow his imagination run wild.
customer_reviews.author: Vetterun

customer_reviews.title: Even better than Legos!
customer_reviews.text: My son received these for Christmas and has been playing with them every day since. He loves them! He is 5 yo and even his older brother (10 yo) enjoys them. These are a great gift for kids who love to build. This box is small and doesn't seem to have that many pieces, but it seems to be enough for all of their creations.
customer_reviews.author: NY mom

customer_reviews.title: These are really great, my 5 and 10 year old play together ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really great, my 5 and 10 year old play together with these all the time. Great imaginative play... if you have a child that enjoys building, these are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: The Q

customer_reviews.title: Great, fun little toy.
customer_reviews.text: These little Plus Plus blocks are small and fun! They're great to tinker with, build little things, or even just run your hands through. They push together fairly snugly. Not much else to say about them!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boys at end of school year. To play during down time. They used to be big builders and love legos, but are kind of transitioning out of that phase. However, on rainy down days this was great for entertaining them and their friends and cousins. Even teenagers got involved trying to build the most elaborate item. Great little set for creative minds and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: heather fichtl

customer_reviews.title: This makes my top 10 toy list
customer_reviews.text: Super cool toy! My busy 7 year old son carries these to church each Sunday and plays quietly under the pew during the sermon. Keeps his hands & body still so his ears (and mine!) can listen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Encourages imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves these. Highly recommend. Small pieces for smaller kids. Endless possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy's mom

customer_reviews.title: My sons love this Plus Plus toys and play with them for ...
customer_reviews.text: My sons love these Plus Plus toys and play with them for hours. They construct amazing things with them, everything from cars, to structures and landscapes. Great quality toy. This large box is much more economical versus buying several of the smaller tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wight

customer_reviews.title: Not a Lego but just as much fun
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t looking for a Lego competitor in the house but these are great. My seven yo Grandson really enjoys creating with them!
customer_reviews.author: 4x

customer_reviews.title: Stem center staple!
customer_reviews.text: Plus Plus blocks are a teachers best friend and every students! I am so happy with these and what they bring into the classroom. Kids creativity comes to life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plus Plus...totally cool
customer_reviews.text: Normally my boys lean towards Legos but my nephew told us about plus plus...They are so cool! You can work flat out work in 3d. My two boys 9 and 4 have come up with amazing things.
customer_reviews.author: rachel Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful toy! Grown/ups even love these!
customer_reviews.author: Loves to cook

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old boy loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Plus Plus is a huge hit in our house! The day we got it my 6 year old son made an orca whale, a 3D tree, a 3D car like on the box and a bunch of other stuff. The pieces stay together really well and are easy to put together, very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: joyful_mommy2

customer_reviews.title: the kid loves these things. didn't think she would ...
customer_reviews.text: the kid loves these things. didn't think she would, as they appear too small for a 3 yr old. also thought anything she built would be flimsy and fall apart, but no problems there
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Students and kiddos love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and students go nuts for these!! Adding a base helps if you can add it to your shopping list
customer_reviews.author: ForOurTwoBirds

customer_reviews.title: A creative toy for boys and girls.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for older kids - mine are 6 and 8 and these hold their interest. Make sure you get enough of them!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: These were different from anything we have.
customer_reviews.text: These were different from anything we have, so that in itself made it exciting. Kept kids busy for a long time and they made really neat creations on their own without any directions.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: We love love love this set my older kids ages 5y
customer_reviews.text: We love love love this set my older kids ages 5y, 3y, and 2y love playing with these cubes(?)
customer_reviews.author: Y.T.

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard. Not suitable for small children!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! The price is a little steep but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great toy for boys or girls.
customer_reviews.text: Quite a large age range can enjoy this toy. They play with it for hours. They can make pictures or build structures or characters
customer_reviews.author: Char F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little spendy but my son loves them. This product came early. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: SImone Elias

customer_reviews.title: My son will love these make-your-own-puzzle pieces
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for such speedy shipping! My son will love these make-your-own-puzzle pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L. Warmuth

customer_reviews.title: But so far so good. We've played with them with friends about 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We found this when another child was playing with them. We were afraid they would go everywhere. But so far so good. We've played with them with friends about 4 times and we've never lost any (that we know of). The kids have built a storm trooper, (their version of a millennium falcon), tanks and flowers. Huge hit and would definitely buy again. Easy to assemble, store and pull apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: for all ages
customer_reviews.text: fun toy for ages 3-7 so far...they play for hours!
customer_reviews.author: E. levin

customer_reviews.title: Fun, versatile, different
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep an activity on the counter or table to draw family members in. Chatting is easier when your hands are occupied. These are fun and different. They are surprisingly versatile and keep the hands busy for a nice chat. Even better everyone seems to enjoy playing together - there are plenty to share.
customer_reviews.author: sdtabis5

customer_reviews.title: Hours and Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids age 3 to 10 have played with their plus pluses for hours and hours. I'm amazed at the 2-D and 3-D creations they come up with all on their own. When people are looking for a gift idea, plus pluses are one of my top recommendations. The picture is of their "Mulan" dolls they made with their plus pluses. (We have multiple sets, so the colors aren't necessarily all available in the basic set.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun! Fun! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have these in my childcare center. I literally have to hide them for the children to pick other centers! We love these tiny little blocks! The imagination the children use to build so many things is astounding. The only drawback is that they are tiny little things (lol) and will get lost easily if not kept safely. These are not for 3 years and under!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly N. Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 70 pieces sets for 3.5 year old and they loved it. While they are too young to build 3D and follow the instructions, it stimulate their imagination and have been so creative. Our son who is super active and loud can spend hours quietly building things. Highly highly recommend as they can learn and build different things as they grow.
customer_reviews.author: Lee J. Brenner

product_meta.title: PLUS PLUS - Open Play Set - 1200 Piece - Basic Color Mix, Construction Building Stem Toy, Interlocking Mini Puzzle Blocks for Kids
product_meta.description:
Color:Basic| Size:1,200 Piece| Style:Single

Plus-Plus is a whole new class of construction toy! One simple shape contains endless possibilities and hours of fun. Each piece easily connects to the next and lets your imagination create colorful flat mosaics or work in 3-D to make more intricate builds. Even curves are possible thanks to the unique design of this deceptively simple shape! A perfect STEM toy to develop fine motor skills, focus and patience - as well as design, imagination and creativity! All Plus-Plus sets are compatible with each other and this open play set adds more pieces and colors to the collection for more possibilities and fun.

This 1,200 piece set contains Basic Colors, including Red, Blue, Green, Yellow, Orange, Purple and more. Also includes an Idea Guide Booklet for building. BPA-free and phthalate-free. Designed and made in Denmark.
feature_bullets: BUILDING SET INCLUDES: This open play set includes 1,200 pieces in a colorful basic mix and an Idea Guide booklet
SUGGESTED FOR AGES 5-12: Each Plus-Plus piece measures 3/4" x 1/2". Appeals to a broad range of ages! Made from high quality BPA-free and phthalate-free plastic. Made in Denmark.

SIMPLE DESIGN - FUELS CREATIVITY: One shape, endless possibilities! Every brick easily connects to the next. Create colorful flat mosaics or work in 3-D to make more intricate builds. Mix and match any Plus-Plus set to bring more ideas to life!
EDUCATIONAL FUN: Plus-Plus empowers children with free explorative play as they encourage fine motor skills, logic, creativity and imagination all without the use of screens. A great STEM toy.

PERFECT FOR ON-THE-GO: Design and build your creations any way you want, wherever you want! Great for every adventure – car rides, restaurants, a friend’s house, or in your own living room. Stay entertained for hours!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
